text.content:
Deceptive Veil

The monster can alter its appearance through illusion. The entry specifies the type and size of the form it can take. The monster's statistics remain unchanged. A successful Insight check (opposed by the monster's Bluff check) allows an observer to notice that the monster is disguised by an illusion.
Changing appearance requires a minor action unless otherwise specified.

Published in Monster Manual, page(s) 281.
